Hello and welcome to the <#981714727254257664> channel <:nfteth:822186186016948314> 

Feel free to reach out to the Gnosis Chain Team at any point with your questions! 

Just giving you all a quick snapshot for you to get quickly acquainted!


👀 **ABOUT** 
The** Gnosis Chain **is a stable payments EVM (Ethereum Virtual Machine) blockchain designed for fast and inexpensive transactions. The chain uses a unique dual-token model; xDai is a stable token used for transactions, payments, and fees, and Proof of Stake protection will be provided by GNO with the consensus-layer Gnosis Beacon Chain.


🏆 **PRIZE OVERVIEW **

Deploy an innovative dApp on Gnosis Chain, formally known as xDai Chain.
🥇 1st prize: $3,000
🥈 2nd prize: $1,500
🥉 3rd prize: $500

**↓ Full Prize Breakdown Here ↓ **
https://ny.ethglobal.com/prizes/


🚀 **WORKSHOP** 
*Gnosis Chain will not be hosting a workshop.*


🔗 **IMPORTANT LINKS**
Main documentation: https://developers.gnosischain.com/
Getting started: https://developers.gnosischain.com/for-users/getting-started-with-gc
Developer resources (block explorer, RPC endpoints, dApp Toolings) https://developers.gnosischain.com/for-developers/developer-resources
Gnosis Chain Discord: https://discord.com/invite/gnosischain
Hey, we are looking for a game on gnosis chain using NFTs, being multiplayer with potentially an interest in having guilds. Or just the hottest game right now. Any recommendation?
https://reality.eth.link/app/template-generator/ cant seem to load the template generator
Hey! What are you trying to use this for?
We are looking to use Reality Module from Zodiac
Got it - I think you should post in the <#957997786270408724> channel! (cc <@372424005216370689>)
thanks will do, thanks
Check out the Dark Forest!
Alternatively, POAPs are the biggest trove of NFTs on Gnosis right now
Thanks! Any way to get an invite ?
I believe there’s a lobby now where you can spin up your own game

Are there any chance for meet somebody from gnosis chain team on venue for pitch our project today?
Hey sure! I’ll DM you

Hey yes! If you haven’t stopped by, we are at the Gnosis booth on the first floor

Hello and welcome to the <#981714727254257664> channel <:nfteth:822186186016948314>

Feel free to reach out to the Gnosis Chain Team at any point with your questions!


👀 **ABOUT**
**Gnosis Chain** is a highly decentralized EVM blockchain designed for fast and inexpensive transactions, scalability, community, and sustainable growth. The chain uses a unique dual-token model; xDai is a stable token used for transactions, payments, and fees, while GNO is used to secure the network through governance and staking.

🏆 **PRIZE OVERVIEW**

**Most innovative dApps on Gnosis Chain:**

🥇 Gold Prize: $8,000
🚀 Silver prize: $6,000
🤝 Bronze prizes (2 winners): $3,000

Hey Gnosis team - would be super keen to hear about any activity or support for gaming / zk Apps / zkML apps within the Gnosis ecosystem
Our project "Snarky Monsters!" is a Pokémon-style battle game where offchain interaction with NPCs can be trustlessly attested to onchain
One of the things we like about Gnosis is how fast the NPC interactions and proof generation could potentially be
For a really slick gameplay loop
I'm building it with <@503742597462753297>
We're trying to decide what L1/L2 to build on at the moment
Hey here is the ecosystem map FYI. There are actually more zk projects & games deploying on Gnosis Chain, for example https://mithraeum.io/ is one I enjoy playing recently.

Additional information for your reference. The speed of NPC interactions and proof generation would depend on various factors. As a suggested method, zk-SNARK should be used to enable efficient proof generation through zero-knowledge proof. Some games in our ecosystem also used zkSNARK, e.g., Darkforest, Mithraeum, etc.

Reference: 
1. The core idea here is to use a zk-SNARK (Groth16) to produce a validity proof (which is constant size) and can be efficiently verified on-chain on Gnosis. https://www.ingonyama.com/blogs/bridging-the-multichain-universe-with-zero-knowledge-proofs
2. Gnosis has provided a $600k grant to 0xParc to fund R&D into a zkSNARK-enabled light client, a necessary part of a trust-minimized bridge (see GIP-57 proposal). https://docs.gnosischain.com/bridges/roadmap/#proof-of-deposit-validity-proofs

Curious about something conceptual wrt hashi-- is there a hashi-specific chat to hang out in? Basically wondering if allowing a user to choose whether or not to use Hashi for security or speed on a given bridge actually increases security at all for said bridge, or if it just increases the potential attack surface at the end of the day, since ultimately a bad actor could choose "turn Hashi off" for an attack if the user-facing side offers the option

I suspect it's the latter since the risk is on the provider/bridger side rather than the user side i.e. i have to make my bridge more secure overall rather than offering lower security for a cheaper price on a given transaction
super interesting concept tho so I'd love to just lurk in a chat about it somewhere lol

Here's what we built:

**Name**: 🐰 TBS

**Description**: TBS is a high-performance blockchain scaling platform that achieves scalability through sharding technology, while maintaining a high level of security and decentralization.

**How does it work**:
TBS currently employs Ethereum, Gnosis Chain, Polygon, and Polybase as its layer 1 blockchains. It deploys corresponding smart contracts on these chains to create time beacons and verify the generation of blocks on sharding chains (including shard ID, hash, time, and creator). TBS sharding nodes implement the TBS protocol using a fork of Ethereum-js, and compose a TBS network via libp2p. They use NTP for epoch synchronization and slot allocation in block generation.

The TBS testbed is both a visualization and a development tool for the TBS blockchain. This decentralized JavaScript application runs in the browser, is distributed via IPFS, and is connected via libp2p. It utilizes ECharts for visualizing TBS networks and benchmarking. A GitHub workflow automatically publishes the main version to IPFS.

**Github**: https://github.com/ericwangqing/tbs

Public URL: https://ethglobal.com/showcase/tbs-hqkne

Hi team!

🔥 ** What we’ve built ?** A dApp that uses Chainlink oracle to provide escrow service to financial institutions, to increase the amount of credit they can lend in** fiat local currency **to unbanked people from LatAm, without taking extra risk. The person without credit scoring sets up a warranty in **stablecoin** and the institution grants them a credit card /credit for the same amount or more, according to their business rules. 

🌐  **Where? **We’ve developed this project on EVM-compatible blockchains and love to developed on **Gnosis chain blockchain. Would love some feedback 🙂 **

🕯️ **Why?** This helps the **65% unbanked population of LatAm ** and contributes the overall economic growth of the region. After this first step, people demonstrate the ability to pay in local currency their debts and **start building their credit scoring** that will allow them to access better options in the future. 

🚀 **What’s next?** We are working in the unification of different wallets using zero-knowledge proofs and verifiable credentials to create a n**ew decentralized digital identity**, cross-lender, cross-blockchain, and cross-scoring protocols unifying them. 

Check it out:  https://ethglobal.com/showcase/xscrow-j571i

Cheers! Xscrow team 🙂
